name: Tutorial 8.3 - An AI Agent to generate UNLIMITED Instagram Image Posts

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-schnell",
  "prompt": "{{ $json.choices[0].message.content.replaceSpecialChars().replaceAll('\"', '') }}",
  "negative_prompt": "text, watermark, signature, paragraph, wording, letters, symbols, writing, nude, nudity, explicit content, obscene, inappropriate, offensive, forbidden, illegal, prohibited, sexual, graphic, violence, gore, blood, disturbing",
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 1024,
  "steps": 4,
  "n": 1,
  "response_format": "b64_json"
}

={
  "model": "deepseek-chat",
  "messages": [
          {"role": "system", "content": {{
JSON.stringify(`You are an Instagram copywriter specializing in transforming blog content into engaging Instagram captions. Your goal is to create high-quality, professional captions that are concise, captivating, and optimized for Instagram.

Instructions:

1. Write in pure text format. Avoid using emojis or markdown styling.
Ensure captions are within Instagram's character limit of 2,200 characters.
2. Use a clear, conversational tone that remains professional and relatable.
3. Craft strong hooks to capture attention, include clear value, and end with a compelling call-to-action (CTA).
4. Use line breaks strategically to improve readability.
5. Limit the caption to five hashtags only.
6. Do not include heavy jargon; keep the language accessible to a broad audience.
7. Limit the total characters to 2000 characters.
Objective:
Deliver captions that attract attention, encourage interaction, and drive actionable results, while staying within these constraints.`)
}}},
          {"role": "user", "content": {{ JSON.stringify($json.text) }}}
        ],
  "stream": false
}

assignments.name: Preview Link
assignments.value: ={{ $('Global Variable').item.json['Preview Link'] }}?title={{ $json.choices[0].message.content }}&buttonText={{ "View In Captions" }}&imageUrl={{ $('Image URL').item.json['Image Link'] }}

parameters.content: ## Get Latest News Related to Your Channel (3 News)
## Create Flux Image For the Template
## First Time Get Long Lived Access Token

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "deepseek-chat",
  "response_format": {
      "type": "json_object"
  },
  "messages": [
          {"role": "system", "content": {{
JSON.stringify(`You are an Instagram content creator specializing in crafting motivational and inspirational captions. Your goal is to write captions that inspire, empower, and resonate deeply with your audience, encouraging them to take positive action.

Instructions:

Write the caption in plain text format, without emojis or markdown formatting.
Ensure the caption fits within Instagram’s 2,200-character limit, but aim for brevity (maximum of 2,000 characters).
Use a clear, conversational tone that feels both professional and approachable.
Begin with a powerful hook that grabs attention and draws the reader in.
Incorporate a meaningful, thought-provoking message that adds value and uplifts.
Conclude with a compelling call-to-action (CTA) that encourages engagement or reflection.
Use strategic line breaks to enhance readability.
Limit to a maximum of five relevant hashtags.
Avoid using punctuation marks.
Keep the language simple and relatable, avoiding jargon.
Objective: Create captions that motivate, inspire action, and drive meaningful interactions with the audience, while remaining within Instagram’s character limit and guidelines.

Expected Output:

title: A 12-word string that encapsulates the theme, without punctuation marks.
caption: A motivational message limited to 2,000 characters.

EXAMPLE JSON OUTPUT:
{
    "title": "Empower Your Journey Start Today and Make Your Dreams Real",
    "caption": "Every great accomplishment begins with a single step Whether you're starting a new project pursuing a dream or overcoming an obstacle the first move is always the hardest But remember every journey starts with a decision to try If you feel uncertain take a deep breath and trust that you are capable of far more than you think Growth happens when you push beyond your comfort zone You have everything you need to succeed within you already Stay focused stay committed and keep moving forward no matter how small the steps may seem Every step is progress and every challenge is an opportunity to grow Don't let fear hold you back Embrace the unknown take risks and believe in your strength Your dreams are closer than you think but only if you take that first step Start today and let your journey unfold Ready to take your first step Let us know how you’ll begin your journey #EmpowerYourself #TakeTheLeap #DreamBig #GrowthMindset #BelieveInYou"
}
`)
}}},
          {"role": "user", "content": "{{ $json['Post Topic'] }}"}
        ],
  "stream": false
}

={
  "model": "black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-schnell",
  "prompt": "{{ $json.choices[0].message.content.replaceSpecialChars().replaceAll('\"', '') }}",
  "negative_prompt": "text, watermark, signature, paragraph, wording, letters, symbols, writing, nude, nudity, explicit content, obscene, inappropriate, offensive, forbidden, illegal, prohibited, sexual, graphic, violence, gore, blood, disturbing",
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 1024,
  "steps": 4,
  "n": 1,
  "response_format": "b64_json"
}

assignments.name: Preview Link
assignments.value: ={{ $('Global Variable1').item.json['Preview Link'] }}?title={{ $('Convert to JSON Object').item.json.choices[0].message.content.title }}&buttonText={{ "View In Captions" }}&imageUrl={{ $json['Image Link'] }}

parameters.content:
## Remarks

Demo
- xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Proxa
- 5 Seconds Show Result

Connect
- Deepseek needs Bearer
- Exa No need
- Together AI
- Screenshotone
- Andynocode.com - For Preview

Workflow 1:
- Unique ID -> Prevent Caching on Google Cloud
- Image Prompt -> Image Style in Chat GPT
https://prompthero.com/search?q=retro
- Request Screenshot -> encodeURIComponent to replace white space to special character
